content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to claim a test case execution, make sure you quickly claim a test case right after the test starts. If a Tester aborts an execution, it will become available to everybody again, so it's worth checking the test later again even if you cannot claim (any more) test cases.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/20017e73-fc4b-463f-9355-391ab8b7b64f/image2020-2-28_16-45-54.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":756,\"height\":399}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You cannot claim a test case execution if you have already completed that test case, if you don't have one of the required environments, if all executions are currently being worked on by other Testers, or if the test runtime is up.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/565ac939-3e3f-4ace-9d47-36bb09e1ab27/image2020-2-28_16-46-52.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":476,\"height\":109.00000000000001}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, 0, 0)\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"font-size\":\"medium\",\"font-style\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-ligatures\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-caps\":\"normal\",\"font-weight\":\"400\",\"letter-spacing\":\"normal\",\"orphans\":\"2\",\"text-align\":\"start\",\"text-indent\":\"0px\",\"text-transform\":\"none\",\"white-space\":\"normal\",\"widows\":\"2\",\"word-spacing\":\"0px\",\"-webkit-text-stroke-width\":\"0px\",\"text-decoration-style\":\"initial\",\"text-decoration-color\":\"initial\",\"display\":\"inline !important\",\"float\":\"none\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TEST CASE EXECUTION\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note you have limited time to run/complete one test case. If time is up and you did not manage to go through all the steps or create a bug, the results will be lost, test case will become available for other testers as well.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the beginning of a test case, a precondition might be displayed. You may only continue if you meet this condition.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6087fea9-d813-4e48-b71a-93bbde58d704/image2020-2-28_16-47-58.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":424,\"height\":199}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every step has a description telling you what to do on the page that you are currently on. For example, one step might ask you to “Add a product to the shopping cart”. Many times, it will also state an expected result.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Executing each step accurately is very important, so please make sure to read every step properly, upload the right attachments, and to provide appropriate answers to questions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6aff63c4-9a68-4c07-b570-7b16aa558dbc/image2020-2-28_16-48-36.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":237,\"height\":437}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Step execution succeeds\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you were able to perform the action (and if you can observe the expected result), you check the step via the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Passed\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"button.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/07f16f1d-4d76-4d2d-83c9-8a72685e9d5f/image2020-3-2_10-38-10.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":365,\"height\":456}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some steps will require you to upload an attachment proving that the current step was successful or that you are on the correct page. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/38bb2af9-f6df-479d-ac7e-a6f8041652b1/image2020-3-2_10-40-6.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":507,\"height\":339}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"while others will ask you to answer a question, or not ask for any of the two.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c4c53d5a-2bcd-4a0e-8136-4deffadf5993/image2020-3-2_10-39-30.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":508,\"height\":319}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Step execution fails\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are executing a step of a test case and notice that you cannot perform the described action, it means your step execution fails and we ask you to describe what happens instead in detail. There are two possible options here:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tThe bug observed by you has not been submitted by any tester in the test and you are asked to submit a new test case bug report.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tThe bug observed by you has already been submitted by another tester and you can submit a test case bug reproduction.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case the bug you've encountered while executing a test case step has not been submitted by any other test before, we ask you to submit a new bug report and describe the behavior observed by you in more detail. If you're creating a new test case bug, please make sure to follow our regular bug report rules. As soon as you click 'Failed' in your test case execution form, you will be offered to either submit a new bug report or to choose the bug submitted by another tester:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":38202,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b790b344-1d0c-4111-8ac6-1c7664c90e83/test 1.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b790b344-1d0c-4111-8ac6-1c7664c90e83/test 1.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"test 1.JPG\",\"name\":\"test 1.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b790b344-1d0c-4111-8ac6-1c7664c90e83\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":812,\"height\":253},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you cannot find your bug in the list, please choose 'Submit a new bug'. You will see the following bug report form in this case:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":35405,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9751ea6d-7b5e-47b0-bb78-8f17d40acb06/test 2.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9751ea6d-7b5e-47b0-bb78-8f17d40acb06/test 2.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"test 2.JPG\",\"name\":\"test 2.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9751ea6d-7b5e-47b0-bb78-8f17d40acb06\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":545,\"height\":585},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your bug report will be reviewed by the Team Leader and the customer who can send you information requests if something is unclear, just like in exploratory tests. Please respond as soon as possible but within 24 hours max. If your bug report is not valid, it will be rejected, but it does not invalidate your test case execution.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHowever, if you can find the bug you've encountered in the list of already submitted bug reports, please create a reproduction instead of a new bug report.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you encounter the same bug that has already been submitted by another tester, we ask you to submit a test case bug reproduction. In this case, you only need to select the appropriate bug report from the drop-down list and provide the necessary attachment. Please note that your attachment should meet our standard bug reproduction requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":34561,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a04f007-4747-45cd-9127-7bd4781ecec3/test 3.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a04f007-4747-45cd-9127-7bd4781ecec3/test 3.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"test 3.JPG\",\"name\":\"test 3.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1a04f007-4747-45cd-9127-7bd4781ecec3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":764,\"height\":347},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note that you will not be able to edit the original bug report raised by another tester or to update your reproduction once you submit it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What to do when you cannot proceed with the execution\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you found a bug in the previous step – you couldn't complete its demanded action – and you now struggle with the current step, you might have to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"terminate the execution\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" at this point. Before doing that, make sure there is no workaround; you might be able to produce the necessary result for the previous step via a different path or function and thus be able to continue with the execution. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Try to finish the execution if possible.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you could have continued the execution but terminated it early, the Team Leader will have to reject your test case execution. On the other hand, if you should have terminated the execution but instead continued and submitted a bug report for each following step, these superfluous reports will be rejected.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep in mind that the management and maintenance of test cases are pretty complex – sometimes steps aren't perfectly described. Try your best to solve such problems or ask the Team Leader for clarification or help.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Test case timer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each test case has time limit. It is different for the clients.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please, watch the time so it doesn't run out before the end of your execution.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Two minutes before the end of the test case time, a popup will appear with a suggestion to extend the test case by 10 minutes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the test case wasn’t extended, the time runs out and all the defects which were submitted disappear. Time spent on this test case doesn’t go to time.epam.com.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bug reports\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The list of bugs created by you and other Testers can be found in the Bugs tab. The title of the bug will refer to the test case and the failed step.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0e4ae9e0-8d3b-450a-a7a5-0138233e2d25/image2020-3-2_10-41-47.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":754,\"height\":166}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The list of your reproductions is available in 'My Issues' - ‘My Reproductions’:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":51578,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9d8b98fd-6ec4-4e7a-ab68-9235b3c32b44/test 4.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9d8b98fd-6ec4-4e7a-ab68-9235b3c32b44/test 4.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"test 4.JPG\",\"name\":\"test 4.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9d8b98fd-6ec4-4e7a-ab68-9235b3c32b44\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1037,\"height\":383},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you open a particular test case bug reproduction from the list, you will be redirected to the initial bug report. Details of all available reproductions are displayed in ‘Can be reproduced on’ section:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":65218,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/77916dfd-4223-45b0-8fdd-f8cd2fcb1d74/test 5.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/77916dfd-4223-45b0-8fdd-f8cd2fcb1d74/test 5.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"test 5.JPG\",\"name\":\"test 5.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"77916dfd-4223-45b0-8fdd-f8cd2fcb1d74\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055.0234375,\"height\":524.6291410519126},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
